Modern Deck Lists, A-E
======================



 Posted in **Event Coverage**
 on September 4, 2011 






![](https://media.magic.wizards.com/styles/auth_small/public/images/person/authorpic_EventCoverageStaff.jpg)
By Event Coverage Staff











Pro Tour Philadelphia featured the debut of the Modern Constructed format. Listed below are players with last names starting with A-E who did not record 18 points or more during the 10 rounds of Modern.
